ygData.subject: Re: Possibilities and guides...
ygData.msgSnippet: On EQ lizer they had a link to a research compendium in the news section.  This new research list included all know information for all 4 research classes.
ygData.messageBody:
On EQ'lizer they had a link to a research compendium in the news
section. This new research list included all know information for all
4 research classes. The enchanter section had more information for
high level research that would be nice to see on your page.

Keep up the good work on EQE!

Q.

--- Greg Short <eq@...> wrote:
> From: "Greg Short" <eq@...>
>
> I am int he process of revising an updating EQE now
> so if there is stuff you
> would like amended/changed or whetever tomake it
> better let me know.
>
> Baels.
